Key.description: The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:.

Value.description: The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 255 Unicode characters.
